name: Brainstorming: optimal DAO Legal Wrappers & regulation
description:
We want to brainstorm about how to best create DAO regulation and legal wrappers in any jurisdiction.
We might also get into designing crypto laws. This will we very much participants driven.
Niklas is running this together with Florian Langmann. We want to take the findings and iterate on them in the legal engineering event we run may10th-12th at Prospera.
